Title: Raises the lower age of juvenile delinquency jurisdiction from seven to twelve years of age
Summary: Raises the lower age of juvenile delinquency jurisdiction from seven to twelve years of age.
LawCode: Amd Fam Ct Act, generally; amd ยง34-a, add Art 6 Title 12-A ยง458-o, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the social services law, in relation to raising the lower age of juvenile delinquency jurisdiction from age seven to age twelve
